Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can show two people trying to communicate over a long distance in their drawing.
The student can include a string telephone in their drawing that connects the two people.
The student can demonstrate in their drawing how the string telephone uses sound to send and receive information.
The student can use only basic materials (like cups and string) in their drawing to show the string telephone works.
The student can indicate in their drawing how the communication device provides a solution to the problem of distance.
